description: Try our easy to follow Caesar Salad Jars recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Caesar Salad Jars Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine aioli and lemon juice together and season. Layer lettuce, sprouts, egg, chicken, bacon and bread into 3 jars, adding dressing as you go. Secure with lids and refrigerate until ready to serve.
